ADTEXT_1.message: Qualified pilot needed for clandestine assignment: Pay {cash}.

ADTEXT_2.message: Ship and crew wanted for a combat mission in the {system} system.

ADTEXT_3.message: Need qualified mercenary with well-equipped ship. Mission details available on request.

ADTEXT_4.message: {org} seeks fearless mercenary for a mission to the {system} system. Will pay {cash}.

AREA.description: An allotted area for the mission

BONUS_1.message: أعجب مشرفي بأدائك وقد خصص مكافأة نقدية قدرها {cash} لهذه المهمة.

BONUS_2.message: لقد خدمتنا جيدا! سأدفع لك مكافأة تقدر بـ {cash}.

BONUS_3.message: مبهر جدا! صُرح لي بالدفع لك مكافأة تقدر بـ {cash}.

BONUS_4.message: أنا مسرور جدا بأدائك! لقد قمت بنقل {cash} إضافي.

CORPORATION_6.message: منقبو المعادن الثمينة ذ م م

CORPORATION_7.message: {name} لباحثي المواد الخام بي إل سي

DENY_1.message: اسف، أحتاج لطيار لديه خبرة أكثر في المعارك.

DENY_2.message: اعذرني يا سيدي. أنا  أحتاج لمحترف حقيقي.

DISTANCE.description: Distance in space, between two locations

DO_I_NEED_SPECIAL_EQUIPMENT.message: Do I need any special equipment?

FAILUREMSG_2.message: انت متأخر للغاية! لقد كبدتني خسائر كبيرة. لن يتم الدفع لك!

FAILUREMSG_3.message: انت عار علي كل الطيارين. لا يمكنني الدفع لك.

FAILUREMSG_4.message: لقد فشلت! أنا لن أدفع لك!

HARVESTING_1.message: The {org} will pay {cash} for a {mission} mission in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). We have reason to believe that a ruthless market competitor is responsible for the disappearance of our freighters at {area}. Distance to the target area is {dist} ly.

HARVESTING_2.message: Our market competitor is seriously claiming he has ownership of {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). The {org} totally disagree and is willing to pay {cash} for a combat mission at {area}. {area} is in a distance of {dist} ly.

HARVESTING_3.message: Please help! We received a distress call from one of our freighters orbiting {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). The call was interrupted, so we fear the worst. Distance to {system} is {dist} ly. The pay is {cash}.

HARVESTING_IT_MUST_BE_COMPLETED_BY.message: من المهم أن تنتهي المهمة بحلول {date}. يرجى التزام الصمت حيال هذه المهمة.

HARVESTING_LAND_THERE.message: We have a salesperson in every nearby star system. Land at a station before the deadline and our staff will contact you about the payment.

MEET_ME_THERE.message: Meet me in the {rendezvous} system before the due date!

MILITARY_1.message: Military intelligence believe that a hostile faction has set up a secret listening outpost on {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). The government can not tolerate this and have approved a series of operations to wipe out this facility. The enemy tries to disguise its origin by using only civilian spacecraft types. We do it like this too! So we are willing to hire a mercenary for {cash}. {area} is located {dist} ly from here.

MILITARY_2.message: In response to a case of piracy in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), {dist} ly, the local authorities pay {cash} for a combat mission at {area}.

MILITARY_3.message: The counter intelligence corps needs a civil pilot who asks no questions for a {mission} mission in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), {dist} ly. Pay is {cash}.

MILITARY_IT_MUST_BE_COMPLETED_BY.message: A task force will be assembled to regain control of {area}. It's important that the mission is successfully completed by {date}.

MILITARY_LAND_THERE.message: Visit a station in the territory protected by the {org}! The operation requires that the mission objective is achieved on time.

MINING_1.message: The {org} is in a dispute with a rival company about {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). To push through our claims we need a reliable and combat experienced mercenary. We offer {cash} for the expenses. Distance to {system} is {dist} ly.

MINING_2.message: I'm a manager of the {org}. We need additional help in a longtime legal dispute with a competitor about the mining rights in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), {dist} ly. We lost patience and would like to speed things up outside of the courtroom. Your mission would be to jump to {area} for {cash}.

MINING_3.message: I work for the {org}. Some of our freighters will arrive shortly at {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). To increase the safety of our employees and to protect the equipment we are willing to pay {cash} for a {mission} mission. Distance to {area} is {dist} ly.

MINING_IT_MUST_BE_COMPLETED_BY.message: هناك قافلة في طريقها إلى {area}. من الضروري أن تنتهي المهمة بحلول {date}.

MINING_LAND_THERE.message: We have employees in every nearby star system. Just visit the nearest station before the due date and get in contact with the local office there.

MISSION_INFO.message: Target area reached. Start data logging. Predicted maximum mission time {duration}.

MISSION_TYPE_3.description: Name of mission type. Derived from Fighter Sweep. An aggressive mission to hunt down and destroy every enemy fighter in the allotted area.

MISSION_WARNING.message: Target area too far away. Cannot complete data collection.

OBJECTIVE_1.message: ليس من الضروري مهاجمة العدو. نريد بيانات حول القدرة الدفاعية ووقت الاستجابة.

OBJECTIVE_2.message: أضعف قوة العدو قدر الإمكان ومن ثم أقفز إلى بر الأمان.

OBJECTIVE_3.message: افرغ المنطقة المحيطة بـ {area}. كاسراً أي مقاومة.

PLEASE_REPEAT_THE_MISSION_DETAILS.message: من فضلك أعد علي أهداف المهمة!

POLICE_1.message: Police detectives have discovered that a group of pirates try to establish a stronghold on {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), {dist} ly. This must not happen. The local authorities pay {cash} for a mission to {area} as preparation of a police operation.

POLICE_2.message: The {org} will pay {cash} for a combat mission in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). We are short on pilots and ships. So this will be an opportunity for a loyal citizen to make money. The target is a small pirate base on {area}. You need hyperdrive propellant for {dist} ly and additional fuel for the return route.

POLICE_3.message: Our markets were flooded by contraband. The source has been traced back to a hidden base at {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). Only a distance of {dist} ly. Because of the reduced police budget the local authorities would like to outsource this mission and have allotted {cash} credits for this operation.

POLICE_IT_MUST_BE_COMPLETED_BY.message: It's important that the mission is completed by {date}, because more hostile ships are on their way.

POLICE_LAND_THERE.message: Just land at a station with a {org} office. This must be done before the due date in order not to jeopardise the entire mission!

RADAR_NOT_INSTALLED.message: Sorry, I don't think you can handle this without a radar.

RISK_1.message: لدى المنافس موارد محدودة فقط. لا شيء لا يمكنك التعامل معه.

RISK_2.message: لدى المنافس موارد ثانوية فقط. لكنه سيدافع عن موقعه إذا لزم الأمر.

RISK_3.message: المنافس مجهز جيدًا. من فضلك إبقي عينيك مفتوحة!

RISK_4.message: The enemy is very well equipped and has access to the latest technology. Be careful!

SUCCESSMSG_1.message: كنت أعرف أنك الشخص المناسب لمثل هذه المهمة. ها هي دفعتك.

SUCCESSMSG_2.message: شكرا لك لإكمالك ذلك. لقد حولت المال.

SUCCESSMSG_3.message: أرجو أن لا يكون لديك مشكلة كبيرة. لقد دفعت لك للتو.

SUCCESSMSG_4.message: عمل جيد جدًا. لقد دفعت الفاتورة.

TARGET_AREA_REACHED.message: Target area reached. Start data logging.

YOU_NEED_A_RADAR.message: Yes, you need a radar! If you agree, I will program your ship's computer to record the radar data we need. The data will be transferred to me next you come back.
